title: Express Whisk Video
description:
Mastrad’s Express Whisk is an innovative up-and-down whisk. It enables you to mix ingredients effortlessly: all you have to do is lightly press the handle to turn the whisk effortlessly.

Its flexible wires enable it to change shape. A long and slender whisk for whisking in a narrow glass; a classic balloon whisk, perfect for beating egg whites or making whipped cream; or a flat whisk for mixing very small quantities and sauce bases.

Its adjustable ball joint will help you reach all the corners of a bowl or container with ease. Made from silicone, it is nonslip to insure stable movement and scratchproof so as not to scratch your pans or containers. 

The Express Whisk stands upright to avoid contact with your work surface and to keep your kitchen clean.

Our Express Whisk can be used for hot or cold mixtures.
